page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN KENDAL
page.content: Kendal has a{low unemployment figure because it is not dependant on one industry.It has a wide variety of jobs eg. K Shoes, Provincial Insurance, Mintsfeet Industrial Estate, County and District Councils and the ever increasing Building Societies. The forementioned K Shoes was once one of the main places of employment {(10% of people in Kendal),}it is now spread throughout Kendal. Also Kendal is famous for its Mintcake.This Mintcake is taken by}most climbing and other expeditions. Chain stores such as{Booths, Tescos, Fine Fare and Marks {and Spencer}employ a lot of people. Estates keep growing on the outskirts of Kendal bringing in plenty of building jobs. Only{7%}of people in Kendal are unemployed as opposed to the higher figures of Liverpool and Newcastle.
